Title: Requires utilities to notify property owners prior to beginning certain services
Summary: Requires utilities to notify property owners prior to beginning any non-emergency construction or other work that may interfere with a property owner's ability to use, or access such owner's property; requires notice to include, but not limited to, a description of the work to be performed, the expected duration of such work, the location of such work, any road closures or detours that may occur due to such work, any action that may directly and materially impact the use of such property, and the contact information for the utility performing such work; provides notice may include electronic communications, signage, and written materials; exempts cases where a natural or man-made disaster or state of emergency occurs.
LawCode: Add ยง119-e, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring corporations and municipalities to notify property owners prior to beginning certain services
